    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中UserApprovalHandler的使用

      实现UserApprovalHandler的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ApprovalStoreUserApprovalHandler
      A user approval handler that remembers approval decisions by consulting existing approvals.
      class  DefaultUserApprovalHandler
      A default user approval handler that doesn't remember any decisions.
      class  TokenStoreUserApprovalHandler
      A user approval handler that remembers approval decisions by consulting existing tokens.
